00023             bool create (const ESMS::RecListT<T>& list, const std::string& name)
00024             {
00025                 if (const T *instance = list.search (name))
00026                 {
00027                     ESMS::LiveCellRef<T, RefData> ref;
00028                     ref.base = instance;
00029 
00030                     mRef = ref;
00031                     mPtr = Ptr (&boost::any_cast<ESMS::LiveCellRef<T, RefData>&> (mRef), 0);
00032 
00033                     return true;
00034                 }
00035 
00036                 return false;
00037             }
